__e: Well, I don't know, I guess you could do worse.
What do you mean, "could be worse"?
And now might be a good time.
She could be one of us.
And you could have been one of us.
Not anymore. You said I couldn't be what I was.
Because you already are all that you can be.
And to become what I wanted to become... I couldn't be what I am.
Couldn't Have Been No More Than One Or Two
Only God know why she would do something like that, but... but I know one thing for sure is there was no other way.
Yes, I know what you could have been and what you are.
Couldn't you have told me all of this at home?
She could have called me at any time and said,
You said if I pulled this off, I'd get some "me time."
It's what I didn't -- it's what I couldn't -- it's what I couldn't do. Hey, hey.
Yes, I know what you could have been and what you are.
So I tell her I can't do this with her.
I know you don't have that and I could do that.
How come you didn't tell me you could do that before?
Of course, I told him there's nothing I can do.
That's why even I couldn't do anything until now.
I couldn't do anything for her before and now that I can...
Now that she's gone, I can do stuff around here that I couldn't do before.
You said I couldn't do this, but you don't tell me why.
I know you don't have that and I could do that.
I could see him him and me.
She said she could see the house.
You couldn't see him for what he really was.
Now, he couldn't see what it was. But he could hear it breathing.
I could see your dad, tell him you're okay...
For seeing in me what I couldn't.
All I could see was what was in here.
What you said to me the other day about my not being able to see...
I could be at home instead of...
But I was in my room doing homework.
My father couldn't have been more right.
Well, if you're happy then I'm happy, because after all...
You were the man I wanted most and you wanted me and... I couldn't be happier.
If it weren't for Him, you wouldn't be here now.
You were the man I wanted most and you wanted me and... I couldn't be happier.
He couldn't be here today and that's now what we're...
So, um, you said you could help me?
Which is why you could be of some assistance to me.
Now that you're here, you might as well make yourself useful.
Oh, would you give me just a small break?
I thought he could get me what I want.
You could still give me something from time to time.
And why couldn't he tell me?
But he said he couldn't see me anymore.
Why couldn't you have told me when you had your shit together?
